venue.address_2: (Teele Square; just steps from Davis Square)
venue.name: PJ Ryans

item.description:
After work, we'll gather at PJ Ryans Pub in Teele Square on Holland Street for pub grub and drinks from their fantastic beer selection. Then, we'll shoot up the hill for the opening reception of The Alchemist, the most popular comedy on the English stage for two centuries.

In The Alchemist, three foul-mouthed confidence tricksters set out to hoodwink the fools, lechers, and hypocrites in the neighborhood. Using get-rich-quick schemes, New Age mysticism, and a whole trunk-load of disguises, they succeed splendidly, until the ever-expanding bubble of chicanery and deceit finally bursts. Audiences will have no trouble identifying modern counterparts in this fast-paced, double-talking pageant of greed and gullibility.

THE ALCHEMIST
By Ben Jonson
Adapted by Barry Edelstein
Directed by Laurence Senelick
10/28 - $7.00 tickets/opening night reception

http://www.pjryans.co...
item.name: PJ Ryans Pub & The Alchemist
